{

{
  "format": "sovlabs-/a//#/",
  "initialvalue": "sovlabs-a0",
  "reuse": true,
  "name": "sequence1",
  "tenant": "api/tenants/5",
  "type": "pattern",
  "uniquekey": "{{ ownerName | split: \"@\" | first |substring: 0,2 | downcase}}{{ Environment | substring: 0,1| downcase }}{{ OS | substring: 0,1 | downcase }}{{ Application | substring: 0,3 | downcase }}"
}

{
  "initialvalue": "9",

  "length": 3,
  "pad": "0",
  "reuse": true,
  "name": "sequence2",
  "tenant": "api/tenants/5",

}

{
  "initialvalue": "9",

  "pad": "0",
  "reuse": true,
  "name": "sequence3",
  "tenant": "api/tenants/5",

}

{
  "format": "vra73cls/##/",

  "reuse": false,
  "name": "vraSequence",
  "tenant": "api/tenants/5",

}
